duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a world-class planning experience and develop an engagement strategy that supports each client’s unique planning needs.
Uncover opportunities to deepen client relationships through consolidation of assets, referrals, and plan implementations.
Work alongside Financial Consultants and/or Wealth Planners in a financial planning capacity, effectively profiling, navigating, and presenting the output of guidance tools.
Conduct joint appointments with clients, educate and plan with clients to uncover opportunities that lead to client’s success, and create and maintain an organized client contact strategy.
Mentor and support the success of peers, build long-lasting, meaningful relationships with clients, and partner with the adviser to develop further planning opportunities.

education_certification.credential: FINRA Series 7 & 63 licensed; Series 65 or 66 licensed and appropriate state registrations OR ability to acquire series 65/66 upon hire. Financial services experience preferably in financial planning. Degree and/or other professional certifications such as CFP are helpful; if you don’t already have a CFP or degree, our Tuition Reimbursement program can help you obtain one.
